abstract: The addition is to open June 17, 2016, and a tour of the building suggested that the Tate Modern will add a new tourist attraction to the city in the form of a wide balcony running around the entire 10th level.

headline.main: Tate Modern Announces Opening Date for New Extension
headline.print_headline: Bigger Tate Modern Expects to Open in June

snippet: The addition is to open June 17, 2016, and a tour of the building suggested that the Tate Modern will add a new tourist attraction to the city in the form of a wide balcony running around the entire 10th level.
